title: English County Championship Division One Scoreboard
text: April 13, 2018 / 12:59 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago UPDATE 3-English County Championship Division One Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 13 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at stumps on the first day of between Hampshire and Worcestershire on Friday at Southampton, England Worcestershire trail Hampshire by 250 runs with 8 wickets remaining Hampshire 1st innings Jimmy Adams lbw Steve Magoffin 33 Lewis McManus c Ben Cox b Joe Leach 2 James Vince b Steve Magoffin 75 Sam Northeast b Joe Leach 17 Hashim Amla lbw Josh Tongue 36 Rilee Rossouw b Joe Leach 0 Liam Dawson b Daryl Mitchell 24 Gareth Berg Not Out 75 Kyle Abbott lbw Daryl Mitchell 0 Brad Wheal lbw Josh Tongue 4 Fidel Edwards c Ben Cox b Joe Leach 1 Extras 8b 8lb 6nb 0pen 1w 23 Total (75.4 overs) 290 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-5 McManus, 2-111 Adams, 3-122 Vince, 4-158 Northeast, 5-164 Rossouw, 6-193 Amla, 7-233 Dawson, 8-233 Abbott, 9-242 Wheal, 10-290 Edwards Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Joe Leach 15.4 4 42 4 2.68 2nb Steve Magoffin 17 3 61 2 3.59 1nb Ed Barnard 15 2 54 0 3.60 Josh Tongue 16 0 61 2 3.81 1w Travis Head 7 1 35 0 5.00 Daryl Mitchell 5 0 21 2 4.20 Worcestershire 1st innings Daryl Mitchell Not Out 15 Brett D'Oliveira c James Vince b Fidel Edwards 1 Tom Fell b Kyle Abbott 16 Josh Tongue Not Out 4 Extras 2b 2lb 0nb 0pen 0w 4 Total (18.0 overs) 40-2 Fall of Wickets : 1-4 D'Oliveira, 2-36 Fell To Bat : Clarke, Head, Rhodes, Cox, Magoffin, Barnard, Leach Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Kyle Abbott 7 3 14 1 2.00 Fidel Edwards 4 3 2 1 0.50 Brad Wheal 3 0 11 0 3.67 Gareth Berg 4 1 9 0 2.25 Umpire Jeremy Lloyds Umpire Martin Saggers
